name: Rotsam
description: Rotsam is a small, gelatinous ooze that embodies disease and decay, and is capable of moving through narrow spaces effortlessly.
memorable: It can inflict a debilitating disease that reduces hit point maximum over time.
goals: Typically seeks to infect creatures and cause suffering.
relations: Often encountered near areas of decay or disease.
strengths: Immunity to necrotic damage and numerous conditions makes it difficult to incapacitate.
weaknesses: Low armor class and poor physical strength and charisma.
attacks: Diseased Bite attack inflicts piercing and necrotic damage, potentially attaching to and infecting its target.
most_powerful_ability: Bog Rot, a disease that progressively weakens infected creatures.
senses: Blindsight up to 60 feet allows it to detect creatures nearby.
additional_information: Can squeeze through spaces as narrow as 1 inch.
Capable of climbing difficult surfaces including ceilings.
Creates a rot-like rash on infected creatures that causes a smell attracting predators.
Attaches to targets to continuously inflict necrotic damage.
Target must succeed on a saving throw to avoid contracting disease.
test_queries: disease inflicting ooze with necrotic damage
tiny ooze with deadly biting disease
creature that climbs ceilings and causes rot
